title: DevOps Architect
description: Leading DevOps transformation initiatives across the organization. Architecting cloud-native solutions and mentoring a team of 5 engineers. Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through optimization and automation.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI. Managed Kubernetes clusters hosting 100+ microservices. Established monitoring and alerting using Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Infrastructure Engineer
description: Managed AWS infrastructure for multiple teams. Implemented Infrastructure as Code practices using CloudFormation and Terraform. Automated deployment processes reducing manual errors by 95%.

title: Systems Administrator
description: Managed on-premises Linux servers and networking infrastructure. Implemented monitoring and backup solutions. Provided technical support and documentation for IT operations.
